subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=tán
|c=daan6,taan4
|c_note=daan6 - to catapult, to flick, to spring, to be elastic; taan4 - to play (an instrument), to accuse
|h=pfs=thàn
|md=dàng
|mn=ml:tân/tôaⁿ/tw:tōaⁿ
|mn_note=tân - literary; tôaⁿ/tōaⁿ - vernacular

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[shoot]] (with a [[slingshot]]); to [[catapult]]; to [[eject]]
# to [[flick]]; to [[fluff]]; to [[strike]]
# {{lb|zh|music}} to [[play]] (a stringed musical instrument)
#: {{zh-x|彈{tán}琴|to play stringed instruments or piano}}
# to [[spring]]; to [[leap]]; to be [[elastic]]
# to [[accuse]]; to [[criticise]]; to [[expose]]
# {{lb|zh|TCM}} to [[puncture]]
# {{lb|zh|of tear}} to [[fall]]
# {{†}} to [[weigh]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} to [[shine]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} to [[look]] (in the [[mirror]])
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[blather]]; to [[speak]] [[nonsense]]
